languages.text: "Кто же теперь это узнает, людишко... Можешь разобрать логово по кусочкам, можешь пытать меня — ничего ты не найдешь. Сслиты умеют отключать чувство боли, мы нечувствительны к подавителям воли. Так что у тебя есть только один способ получить мои сокровища — открой клетку, дай мне нож, встань на колени и дай вскрыть себе глотку. Пока ты будешь умирать, я открою тебе этот секрет".

"Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."
languages.original_text: "Кто же теперь это узнает, людишко... Можешь разобрать логово по кусочкам, можешь пытать меня — ничего ты не найдешь. Сслиты умеют отключать чувство боли, мы нечувствительны к подавителям воли. Так что у тебя есть только один способ получить мои сокровища — открой клетку, дай мне нож, встань на колени и дай вскрыть себе глотку. Пока ты будешь умирать, я открою тебе этот секрет".

We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me open your throat. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."
traits.speaker: Anger

We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「今さら何が言える、人間よ…巣窟をひとつひとつ壊してもいいし、私を拷問してもいい。だが何も出てこないぞ。我々ススリスは痛みの感覚を遮断する方法を知っているし、意思抑制剤も効かない。つまり、宝を手に入れる方法はただひとつ、檻を開けて私にナイフを渡すんだ。膝をついて自ら喉を切り開くとしよう。死ぬときに秘密を明かしてやる」
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: 「今さら何が言える、人間よ…巣窟をひとつひとつ壊してもいいし、私を拷問してもいい。だが何も出てこないぞ。我々ススリスは痛みの感覚を遮断する方法を知っているし、意思抑制剤も効かない。つまり、宝を手に入れる方法はただひとつ、檻を開けて私にナイフを渡すんだ。膝をついて自ら喉を切り開くとしよう。死ぬときに秘密を明かしてやる」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “谁知道呢，小人儿……你大可以一点一点把这个洞穴拆掉，也可以尽情折磨我，但你什么也别想找到。我们蛇人知道如何切断痛觉，无论你怎么折磨，我都不会有任何反应。所以，如果你打算得到我的财宝，那只有一个办法：打开笼子，给我一把刀，跪在我面前，让我割开你的喉咙。等到你死的时候，我会亲口把秘密告诉你。”
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: “谁知道呢，小人儿……你大可以一点一点把这个洞穴拆掉，也可以尽情折磨我，但你什么也别想找到。我们蛇人知道如何切断痛觉，无论你怎么折磨，我都不会有任何反应。所以，如果你打算得到我的财宝，那只有一个办法：打开笼子，给我一把刀，跪在我面前，让我割开你的喉咙。等到你死的时候，我会亲口把秘密告诉你。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Quién sabe, human{mf|o|a}... Puedes derribar la guarida poco a poco y puedes torturarme, pero no encontrarás nada. Nosotros los Sslyth sabemos apagar nuestro sentido del dolor y los supresores de la voluntad no tienen ningún efecto sobre nosotros. Así que solo hay una forma de que puedas hacerte con mis tesoros: abre la jaula, dame un cuchillo, arrodíllate y deja que te raje la garganta. Te revelaré el secreto mientras mueres».
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: «Quién sabe, human{mf|o|a}... Puedes derribar la guarida poco a poco y puedes torturarme, pero no encontrarás nada. Nosotros los Sslyth sabemos apagar nuestro sentido del dolor y los supresores de la voluntad no tienen ningún efecto sobre nosotros. Así que solo hay una forma de que puedas hacerte con mis tesoros: abre la jaula, dame un cuchillo, arrodíllate y deja que te raje la garganta. Te revelaré el secreto mientras mueres».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Wer kann das schon sagen, Menschling ... Ihr könnt das Versteck auseinandernehmen, Ihr könnt mich foltern ... Ihr werdet nichts finden. Wir Sslyth können unser Schmerzempfinden abschalten, und Willensunterdrücker zeigen bei uns keine Wirkung. Ihr bekommt meine Schätze also nur auf eine Weise in die Finger: Öffnet den Käfig, gebt mir ein Messer, geht auf die Knie und lasst mich Eure Kehle aufschlitzen. Ich verrate Euch das Geheimnis, während Ihr sterbt."
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: "Wer vermag das jetzt noch zu sagen, Menschling ... Ihr könnt das Versteck auseinandernehmen, Ihr könnt mich foltern ... Ihr werdet nichts finden. Wir Sslyth können unser Schmerzempfinden abschalten, und Willensunterdrücker zeigen bei uns keine Wirkung. Ihr bekommt meine Schätze also nur auf eine Weise in die Finger: Öffnet den Käfig, gebt mir ein Messer, geht auf die Knie und lasst mich Eure Kehle aufschlitzen. Ich verrate Euch das Geheimnis, während Ihr sterbt."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Qui saurait le dire, {mf|humain|humaine}... Vous pouvez retourner l'antre sens dessus dessous, vous pouvez me torturer, mais vous ne trouverez rien. Nous autres les Sslyth savons réprimer la douleur, et les suppresseurs de volonté n'ont aucun effet sur nous. Alors, si vous voulez savoir où se trouvent mes trésors, vous n'avez pas le choix : vous devez ouvrir la cage, me donner un couteau, vous agenouiller et me laisser vous trancher la gorge. Et pendant que vous agoniserez, je vous révélerai tout. »
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: « Qui saurait le dire, {mf|humain|humaine}... Vous pouvez retourner l'antre sens dessus dessous, vous pouvez me torturer, mais vous ne trouverez rien. Nous autres les Sslyth savons réprimer la douleur, et les suppresseurs de volonté n'ont aucun effet sur nous. Alors, si vous voulez savoir où se trouvent mes trésors, vous n'avez pas le choix : vous devez ouvrir la cage, me donner un couteau, vous agenouiller et me laisser vous trancher la gorge. Et pendant que vous agoniserez, je vous révélerai tout. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Kim bilir insancık... İster inimin altını üstüne getir ister bana işkence et... Hiçbir şey bulamayacaksın. Sslyth türü olarak acı hissimizi nasıl engelleyebileceğimizi biliriz, irade bastırıcıların da üzerimizde etkisi yoktur. Yani hazinemi ele geçirmenin sadece tek bir yolu var: Kafesi aç, elime bir bıçak ver, diz çök ve gırtlağını kesmeme müsaade et. Sırrımı sen ölürken sana anlatayım."
languages.original_text: "Who can say, humanling... You can tear the den apart piece by piece, you can torture me — you will find nothing. We Sslyth know how to shut out our sense of pain, and will suppressors have no effect on us. So there is only one way you can get your hands on my treasures: open the cage, give me a knife, get on your knees, and let me carve your throat open. I will reveal the secret to you as you die."

traits.locale_text: "Kim bilir insancık... İster inimi paramparça et istersen de bana işkence et... Hiçbir şey bulamayacaksın. Sslyth türü olarak, acı hissimizi nasıl engelleyebileceğimizi biliriz; irade bastırıcıların da üzerimizde etkisi yoktur. Yani hazinemi ele geçirmenin sadece tek bir yolu var: Kafesi aç, elime bir bıçak ver, diz çök ve gırtlağını kesmeme müsaade et. Sırrımı sen ölürken sana anlatacağım."
traits.speaker: Anger
